text:
July 17, 1956
Mr. John H. Lerch
Psy. Warfare Det* 8239
APO $00
c/o Postmaster
San Francisco, California
Dear John:
I have received your letter of July 9 and the tape of program number
eight (8). It is not necessary that I havs a script for that program,
so don't go to all the trouble of -typing one out*
It is my understanding that the REPORT FROM JAPAN series was to run
twelve (12) programs* That is what we have it scheduled for, anyway*
Best regards.
Cordially,
REUtjy
Robert E, Underwood, Jr,
Network Manager
